translated: The Slender Man or Slenderman (which means "thin man") is a world-known fictional character from a CREEPYPASTA invented in 2009 by Victor Surge, following a competition whose goal was to create a monster.
original: Le Slender Man, ou Slenderman (qui veut dire : "l'homme mince") est un personnage de fiction mondialement connu issu d'une creepypasta inventée en 2009 par Victor Surge, suite à un concours dont le but était de créer un monstre.
